fields.text: Summon an abominable beast to fight by your side
Abominables slow enemies and absorb cold damage
Grants you the ability to teleport with extreme efficiency
Create a wall of fire in your footsteps, burning foolish enemies
Comets of ice rain down in a large area, pummeling all impacted enemies
Shoot a bolt of lightning that ricochets between enemies
Call forth the permafrost of the northen tundras to pierce your enemies cold resistance
Uses water found in enemy corpses to freeze surrounding foes
Sends out a massive array of paralyzing lightning while increasing your lightning damage
Enchants targeted allies with fire damage, attack rating and attack speed
Sacrifice mana to absorb damage and gain extra mana from slain enemies
Mana gained per hit increased by 8
Shoots a fireball at a target that explodes on impact
Shoot chaotic fire trails that burn nearby enemies
+1 Fire Trail for every +1 Spell Power
Creates a wall of fire that incinerate enemies caught in it
Maximum number of firewalls increased by 2 and Cooldown Removed
Creates an expanding ring of frost that damages and freezes nearby enemies
Sends out a frozen orb that shoots ice projectiles in all directions
Train an apprentice in the use of lightning to strike down your enemies
Summons a three-headed hydra that shoots fire at your enemies
Launch multiple ice bolts that deal cold damage and slow your enemies
Increase base number of Ice Bolts to 20
+1 Ice Bolt for every +1 Spell Power
Forces nearby enemies to attack the clone, unleashing a frost nova when hit
+1 Ice Clone for every +3 Summoning Power (Max 2)
Summon a meteor from the sky to incinerate enemies in the impact zone
Fire Ball, Fire Storm, Overheat, Blaze
Fire and Physical damage from impact +10%
Creates an expanding ring of lightning that damages nearby enemies
Creates an expanding ring of flame that sets ablaze all it contacts
Siphon your own lightning resistance to increase lightning damage
Minimum lightning damage increased by 50 and   Enemy Lightning Resistance reduced by 20%
+1 Charged Bolt for every +1 Spell Power
Increases your defense and cold resistance while dealing cold damage to melee attackers
Short-Circuit nearby enemies nervous systems, instantly reducing a portion of their life
CLoak yourself in flames, increasing your cast speed and mana regeneration
